name: Community Building Groups
description: A space for LGBTQQ++ youth to meet, connect & create together!
fullDescription: A space for LGBTQQ++ youth to meet, connect & create together!
whatTheyOffer: A space for LGBTQQ++ youth to meet, connect & create together!
howToGetIt: All interested youth need to make an appointment for a one-on-one New Participant Intake (NPI) before joining any of the following Community Building Groups. To sign up for an NPI, or answer any questions, email Keana: keana@lyric.org
